entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
